lines.text: You stay here and I'll head over to that college.
Oh great! I gotta stay here and you get to go to the girls' school.
One of the advantages of a Harvard degree.
Ka ka era!
Which in our language means?
Here comes the bullshit!
How do you want your eggs?
Cooked.
[Gary is standing in the middle of the diner staring at Eleanor]
[from behind him]
Hey you! I told you to take that garbage out ten minutes ago. Now get it out!
Oh Gus, he can't help it. You know he's a little slow.
Never seen anybody so goddamn stupid all my life.
Don't you ever take your job seriously?
Come on, Judd. If we did that we'd end up in the funny farm!

[they arrive at the car and get inside]
Duck ponds, bucket, now a fish tank.
[pause]
'The hell are you eating?
A sandwich. Want some?

[after a moment's pause]
Yeah, give me some.
[Taj hands him half the sandwich and he takes a bite out of it]
What kind is it?
Tuna fish.
[disgusted, Judd hands the sandwich back to him, as Taj roars with laughter]

[explaining the killer's motive to Judd]
You see, animals kill when they're hungry, or when they're threatened. But man is the only animal who destroys his own kind for the sheer pleasure of it.
Is, uh, Professor Millett in? I'd like to speak to him.
I'm afraid that's quite impossible. He's working, he left strict instructions not to be disturbed.
Miss, uh, Adjai. Is that right?
Yes, that's right.
I'm not a traveling salesman, Miss Adjai. I'm a police officer, and I have a badge that says I can disturb anybody anytime.

[after a moment's pause]
I'll see if he can talk to you.

[Millett knocks on the door of the office of Helene Griffin, the headmistriss]
Can I have a word with you, Miss Griffin?
Not right now, if you don't mind, Professor Millett.
[she shuts the door in his face and turns to Kathy, a student in her office, who is upset that Millett dumped her]
Now, why didn't you tell me about this sooner?

[crying]
I thought it would go away.
You can't love a man like that. He's a self-centered ruthless man! You'd think he'd have more sense than to have an affair with one of his students.

[sobbing]
I thought he really liked me.
And I'll tell you what. His teaching days at this school are over. I am not going to allow that Professor Millett to use this school as a playground for his sexual exploits!
